doc.doc-text: This is a path which will be matched with getPathInfo() of the servlet. E.g. If the servlet is mapped to /invoker/*, you would need "/something.service" here in order to match "/invoker/something.service". Usually you shouldn't specify this, as the default is to map as the fully qualified name of the class followed by ".service".
The fully qualified name of the interface class which will be published.
The bean which will implement the interface.
